manual_steps: Copy .env.example to .env.local and set AUTH_SECRET, DATABASE_URL, AUTH_STAFF_EMAIL, AUTH_STAFF_PASSWORD_BCRYPT
For Vercel: set env vars in project settings; deploy apps/web
rollback_steps: Replace project root with prior module zip/tag (no DB changes in Module 0).
notes: Module 0 uses file-based audit logging; DB audit arrives Module 1.
Auth is env-backed (single staff user) to satisfy early deployment.
